name: PolyGone (itch) (greenpepperonisoftware)
description:
PolyGone

Play with your friends or fight against them!

 

Arcade Mode

Team up in Arcade Mode to collect powerups and fight waves of bosses.

1-4 Players, local-coop (or AI substitutes)

 

Battle Mode

Fight it out in Battle Mode to be the last one standing. Use stage hazards to your advantage.

2-4 Players, local-coop (or AI substitutes)

 

Challenge Mode

Looking for a challenge? Try Challenge mode to survive the game's hardest difficulty.

1 Player

 

Penelope Mode

Have a younger player 2? Penelope mode brings a casual setting and an emphasis on letter-shaped asteroids.

1-4 Players, local-coop

System Requirements
  • Windows 7/10 32- and 64- bit or Linux (Ubuntu) 64 bit
  • 1 or more Gamepad/Controller for Local Multiplayer
  • CPU: Anything recently modern (Intel Core2Quad 9550 or newer; AMD A8-9600 or newer)
  • GPU: Modern Integrated GPUs work fine. GTX 1050 is more than enough.
  • Display: Designed for 1920x1080. No lower than 1280x1024 recommended.
  • RAM: 100MB Free
  • HDD: 100MB Free
